turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to go to Starbucks. I'm going to go to Starbucks, and I need you to place an order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: O Club, so I'd really love the caramel I'd like to place for a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Caramel Macchiato, got it, what size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay and did you want any syrups or whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add caramel on top of the caramel? I'd assume, but do they offer caramel as a syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have a grande caramel macchiato with caramel syrup and whipped cream right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. No. No. Medium. Medium with soy milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks sizes are short, tall, grande and venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great. So that's a short caramel Macchiato with caramel syrup and whipped cream using soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, and that should be at the the Starbucks on Main Street and Fairfax.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I've placed your order with the Starbucks on Main Street and Fairfax. It'll be ready in 15 minutes.
